services.title: We develop comprehensive design solutions for residential, commercial, and infrastructure projects

design.title: Design
design.description: Comprehensive development of project documentation for residential, commercial and public facilities. We perform engineering, geological and geodetic surveys. We develop architectural and structural solutions. We coordinate with all authorities.

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: We build buildings from scratch - foundation, monolithic, frame structures. We perform roofing, facade, finishing works, as well as landscaping. We have experience in implementing projects in difficult climatic and soil conditions.

engineering.title: Engineering Solutions
engineering.description: Development and installation of modern engineering systems: ventilation, heating, plumbing, electrical networks, lighting, waterproofing. We use energy-efficient technologies and quality materials for long-term and safe operation of the facility.

energy.title: Turnkey Renewable Energy
energy.description: Our company designs and installs renewable energy power plants. Each of our projects is an individual solution tailored to your needs. We provide precise calculations and design stations with maximum efficiency.

projects.description: We take on the full cycle of work - from conducting land plot potential analytics to completing construction and commissioning. We work responsibly, adhering to deadlines, building codes and standards.

testimonial1.content: The key advantages of TDG COMPANY are high-quality work, a team of highly qualified professionals, efficiency, and responsibility for the commitments undertaken.
testimonial1.author: Chulei S.Y.

testimonial2.content: The works were carried out in accordance with current construction standards and regulations, the terms of the contract, within the established timeframe, with proper quality, in full, without any remarks or claims; all work was performed in compliance with sanitary and fire safety rules, occupational safety regulations, and using modern certified materials at a high technical level.
testimonial2.author: Bernyk M.V.

testimonial3.content: During the execution of general construction, finishing, and engineering works, the employees of TDG COMPANY demonstrated high qualifications, using modern construction materials and technologies. Throughout the process, LLC TDG COMPANY proved to be a reliable general contractor.
testimonial3.author: Chulei S.Y.
